# loopia_zone_records (Data Source)

Fetches DNS zone records for a specific domain and subdomain from Loopia.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain` (String) The domain name to retrieve records for.
- `subdomain` (String) The subdomain to retrieve records for.

### Read-Only

- `zone_records` (Attributes List) List of DNS zone records. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--zone_records))

<a id="nestedatt--zone_records"></a>
### Nested Schema for `zone_records`

Read-Only:

- `priority` (Number) The priority for MX records.
- `record_id` (Number) The unique identifier for the record.
- `ttl` (Number) Time-to-live for the record in seconds.
- `type` (String) The type of the record (e.g., 'A', 'CNAME', 'MX').
- `value` (String) The value of the record. For an 'A' record, this is an IPv4 address.
